text: @realDonaldTrump You are killing Americans by your reckless management of a Pandemic. Your Red States, Florida, Arizona and Texas have more hospitalizations, deaths than anyone in the country. Yet, ignorantly you politize Covid-19 and Mock NY. How deadly will your administration be?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
